name: NU_COVID_19TestsPanelsForSARS_CoV_2GenomicSequence
title: NU_COVID_19 (Tests Panels for SARS_CoV_2 Genomic Sequence)
description: This value set contains some provisional codes created for the COVID-19 response. It may be incomplete, as not all provisional COVID-19 codes are available in VSAC at the time of publication. Please contact the CSTE RCKMS Content Team for a complete list of codes to be included in this value set.
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test panel names consisting of two or more tests for detection of genomic sequence —often for different organisms. The test panels generate two or more code pairs, each pair consisting of a laboratory test for a specific organism’s genomic sequence and a laboratory test result for that test.),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: coronavirus 2 genomic sequence panel),(Exclusion Criteria: none)

concept.display: SARS-CoV-2 (COVID-19) sequencing and identification panel - Specimen by Molecular genetics method
